plot: A one-armed man obtains an artificial limb. The man cannot control his new arm, which steals from passers-by.
title: The Thieving Hand
plot_es: A one-armed man obtains an artificial limb. The man cannot control his new arm, which steals from passers-by.
plot_en: A one-armed man obtains an artificial limb. The man cannot control his new arm, which steals from passers-by.
